subject_terms_3: Photography Thian Hock Keng Temples Buddhism
physical_appearance: The image shows a clolur photograph. It is rectangular and it features a temple. The roofs are purple in colour and they are curving with wide eaves. The roofs are also tiled and there are figures of dragons and pheonix are present on the roofs as well. There is a row of rickshaws lined outside the temple and people can be seen walking past them.
title_text: Thian Hock Keng temple Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Colour photography Thian Hock Keng (Singapore) Temples Buddhism
